description:
The German army demands Yasaka`s jewel and Erika herself, a lead to finding the List of Hope, in exchange for Ramon. Kenshiro heads to the ruined temple alone in order to save Ramon. There he finds Simeon`s follower Shamura dressed as a German soldier. While fighting against Kenshiro, Shamura mentions the Heaven Dipper Sacred Yin Fist.
Meanwhile, at Kenshiro`s mansion, a concerned Erika takes Yasaka`s jewel and suddenly disappears.
Source: crunchyroll
